attributes.action: Charge people who fail to turn up for NHS appointments to reduce waiting lists.
attributes.additional_details: There should also be reminder letters and texts sent with confirmatory phone calls. It would help if there was a list of those who can come at the last minute if there are any cancellations. (1) https://www.dropbox.com/s/3jayarc2k9ym41q/nhs%20envelope.jpg?dl=0
attributes.background: Fine those who fail to attend their NHS appointments. Missed appointments waste valuable NHS resources- £160 per appointment (1)  - and affects other patients attending their GP / hospital. If there was a fine for missing your appointment, without a valid excuse, people would think twice.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the petition we currently have open on this topic:

Fine those who fail to attend their NHS appointments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600157
